short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 'Quality of life' extension for websites that sell books.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
'Quality of life' extension for websites that sell books. Adds book information and ratings to supported bookstore websites.

Zana is an extension that retrieves book information and ratings from third-party services and attaches them to supported bookstore websites.

Zana has the following clients, which are used to retrieve additional book information and ratings
* Client for Google Books API (https://developers.google.com/books)
* Client for Open Library API (https://openlibrary.org/developers/api)


Supported bookstores
* Dukagjini Bookstore (https://dukagjinibooks.com/)
